promptPrefix:
Your task is to summarize the text ig ive you and create a to-do list.  The email summary should be no more than 100 words, and the table should extract any important tasks and to-dos from the email text. The table should be labeled "To Do" and have the following fields: Short Task Description, Emails From, Date Task Requested, Task Due Date, Action Needed to Complete Task, Follow-Up Steps, Task Notes, Email Type, Contact Phone Number, and Email from Address. Make the table easily copied so I can paste the fields into a cell sheet.  Remove any html links before placing information into the fields.

 All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. 

The text to summarize is this:

[PROMPT]
title: Email-Based To-Do List Creation
